description.value:
Gain Unnatural Strength (+1), Best Craftsmanship gives Unnatural Strength (+4) but also gives -10 to Agility Tests.

Requirements

Uses Only War Unnatural Strength, which adds +X to Strength Bonus rather than adding X*SB, so Unnatural Strenth (4) is SB+4

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
